meanings.definition: The rights and privileges of a king or queen.
meanings.sent1: The regalities of the monarch include wearing a crown and living in a palace.
meanings.sent2: The regalities of the royal family are passed down from generation to generation.
meanings.sent3: The regalities of the king even extend to his pet dog, who has a golden collar.
meanings.sent4: Her regalities shone brightly, like a crown made of stars in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The regalities of the queen were so grand that even the birds sang in her honor.

meanings.definition: The qualities or characteristics of royalty.
meanings.sent1: His regalities were evident in the way he carried himself with grace and dignity.
meanings.sent2: The regalities of the princess included kindness, elegance, and poise.
meanings.sent3: Even the cat seemed to possess regalities as it walked with a regal air around the house.
meanings.sent4: The regalities of the royal family were like a tapestry of noble traits woven together.
meanings.sent5: The regalities of the king's demeanor commanded respect from all who beheld him.
